entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Enable running analyzers on `System.Text.RegularExpressions.Generator` project #69523
  • Enable running analyzers on `System.Text.Json.SourceGeneration` project #69522
  • Enable running analyzers on `Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Abstractions` project #69521
  • [wasm] `JIT/Performance/CodeQuality/Linq/Linq/Linq.sh` timing out on linux #69518
  • [wasm] Stack overflow in `JIT/Directed/tailcall/tailcall/tailcall.sh` on Linux #69517
  • [net7][Wasm] Type.TypeInitializer.Invoke() does not run the type initializer #69516
  • [mono] Profiled AOT - PGO tracking #69512
    7.0.0
  • Unsafe.As being intrinsic has exposed a few JIT related issues #69505
  • System.Text.Json.JsonException: '0xE9' is an invalid start of a value. Path: $ | LineNumber: 0 | BytePositionInLine: 0. #69502
  • TcpClient.Connect throws NRE if the Socket is cleared #69493
    7.0.0
  • net6-ios: DateTimeOffset.Local does not have local timezone #69492
    6.0.x
  • LoggerMessage source generator generates error when using template destructuring #69490
  • Profiling API: Profiler was prevented from loading notification 0x2509 #69489
    7.0.0
  • Equals/GetHashCode for UnixDomainSocketEndPoint #69488
  • System.Net.HttpClient does not support signature algorithm ecdsa-with-sha224 #69485
  • Crash when running dotnet command with .NET 7 7.0.100-preview.5.22267.11-win-arm64 #69513
  • MsQuicStream may throw QuicOperationAbortedException when connection is closed by peer #69481
    7.0.0
  • [DependencyInjection] Attempt to create an override chain is reported as a circular reference #69478
  • [NativeAOT] System.Reflection.Tests timeout/hang #69476
  • HTTP2: Extreme performance difference depending on whether ServerGarbageCollection is true or false #69475
  • Test failure System.Formats.Tar.Tests.TarWriter_WriteEntry_File_Tests.Add_File(format: Gnu) #69474
  • JIT perf: ldind.u1 followed by conv.i1 results in suboptimal codegen #69472
  • AOT Blazor WASM in Azure DevOps Pipelin #69479
    7.0.0
  • System.Drawing.Common.Tests fails during libraries test run #69471
  • Microsoft.Extensions.FileProviders.PhysicalFileProviderTests failing when running libraries tests #69470

Closed

  • Microsoft.Interop.SourceGeneration.csproj and LibraryImportGenerator.csproj have hard-coded RunAnalyzers setting #69450
  • Add generic method instantiation information to ETW events #13179
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: char helpers for common ASCII categories #68868
    7.0.0
  • WASM AOT compilation runs indefinitely and consumes all system memory with LanguageExt.Core #69166
    7.0.0
  • [WASM] Wasm.Build.Tests run with `EMSDK` - `clang` failing to load `libLLVM-13git.so` #65956
    7.0.0
  • Add BinarySearchRange for getting lower and upper bounds #30120
    Future
  • CoreCLR_Shutdown and MetaDataGetDispenser Hang #69462
    7.0.0
  • MsQuicStream can leak CancellationTokenRegistrations #69491
  • RegexIgnoreCastTests failures on Windows 7/8.1/Nano server #69482
  • System.Text.Json source generator doesn't work with native AOT `IlcDisableReflection` #68093
    Future
  • Cannot use file stream for [*.deps.json]: No such file or directory #64606
  • Arm64: Performance swing in MicroBenchmarks.Serializers.Xml_ToStream<Location> #63748
    7.0.0
  • Test failure: System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.SocketsHttpHandler_HttpClientHandler_ServerCertificates_Test.UseCallback_BadCertificate_ExpectedPolicyErrors(uri: wrong.host.badssl.com) #69432
    7.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Numerics.Tests.Constructor #68410
    7.0.0
  • runtime-extra-platforms build break in Android in pal_uid.c due to getgrgid_r #69419
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix failure in host test for interleaved output on unhandled exception #69528
    test-bug, area-Host
  • avoid allocation of SafeFreeSslCredentials and SafeDeleteSslContext on Linux #69527
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux
  • [Perf][Mono] Add new Mono Mobile Scenarios to Performance Runs #69526
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/6.0] JIT: Abandon loop search if we reach the end of the bbNext chain #69525
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Allow ZipArchive to create duplicate entries #69524
    area-System.IO.Compression, 7.0.0
  • Use correct AOT annotation on JsonSerializerOptions.GetConverterFromAttribute #69520
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • [WIP][wasm] Build fixes #69519
    NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [wasm-mt] Add coop GC transitions to various EMSCRIPTEN_KEEPALIVE functions; define to noop if no threads #69515
    arch-wasm, area-Threading-mono
  • Allocate less with X500DistinguishedName #69514
    area-System.Security, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Implement vpblendvb optimization in the JIT #69509
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • Fold System.Private.Interop into CoreLib #69508
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [Android] Add UnmanagedCallersOnly attribute to SafeDeleteSslContext.ReadFromConnection/WriteToConnection methods #69507
    area-System.Net.Security, os-android
  • Keep native order of get members call from Type #69506
    area-System.Reflection
  • [iOS] Enable LLVM on device runs #69504
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add NativeMemory.ZeroMemory API #69500
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [Mono] Enable Equals to handle NaN value #69499
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Permit SET OF to be incorrectly sorted in GetNameInfo #69498
    area-System.Security
  • Add the repro case for race condition in revisit_written_pages as a GC test case #69496
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Make superpmi.py collect work on crashes/assertion failures #69494
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make superpmi.py collect easier to use #69487
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • File system type fix #69484
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Switch extra platform coverage from windowsservercore-2004 to windowsservercore-ltsc2019 #69480
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Resumbmit tar feedback changes, include Android build fix #69469
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0

Merged

  • Use shared settings for enabling analyzers in LibraryImportGenerator #69511
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Disable nativeruntimeeventsource test on unix arm and arm64 #69510
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, disabled-test
  • JIT: Abandon loop search if we reach the end of the bbNext chain #69503
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Expand the GC hole fix for explicitly initialized structs #69501
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Minor cleanup and reduce allocations in Apple X.509 certificate PAL #69497
    area-System.Security
  • Add more char.Is* helpers for common ASCII sets #69318
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Fix data race on incoming MsQuicStream abort #69483
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Fix r4 r8 format numbers #66979
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Add current-outgoing-connect-attempts counter to Sockets #66651
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Give is_nullish() a type guard type #69473
    arch-wasm
  • [monoapi] Add MONO_IMAGE_NOT_SUPPORTED to MonoImageOpenStatus #69062
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Do not print anything to stderr running SCD app without deps.json #69314
    area-Host
  • Disable System.Reflection tests on NativeAOT #69477
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix several regex loop issues #69413
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • ARM64 - Do not emit possible DIV_BY_ZERO/OVERFLOW exception blocks for non-zero/non-(negative one) constants #68945
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete securitywrapper/securityutil #69468
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Spanify some Windows X.509 PAL and improve formatting. #69448
    area-System.Security
  • Use Rfc3279DerSequence to get the signature in the right format #69463
    area-System.Security

Updated

  • [wasm] improve I64 memory access #64845
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, needs-author-action, 7.0.0
  • Add ProcessorCount Event to RuntimeEventSource #65581
    area-System.Diagnostics, 7.0.0
  • [mono][eventpipe] Implementing MethodDetails and BulkType events #68571
    area-Tracing-mono
  • Run host tests with dotnet test and enable crash/hang dumps #69340
    area-Host
  • Use SubtleCrypto API on browser DOM scenarios #65966
    area-System.Security, 7.0.0
  • WIP: Cross module work #68919
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [API Implementation]: Expose `StopTheHostException` #69404
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • Always morph GT_MOD for ARM64 #68885
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Draft] Fix hard link creation in tar tests in Android, iOS, tvOS #69416
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Adding Int128 and UInt128 with a base software implementation #69204
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm] First attempt at a wasm app host #68696
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Improve Interop.Sys.ReadLink loop with stackalloc #69335
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Support immutable types with configuration binding #67258
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Fix SystemNative_SendFile on iOS/tvOS devices #69436
    area-System.Net.Sockets, os-ios, os-tvos
  • Deleting field sequences from `LCL_FLD` and `VNF_PtrToArrElem` #68986
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Optimize string.EndsWith(char) for const values #69038
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance
  • JIT: Remove unneeded unconditional jumps #69041
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm-ep] Minimal diagnostic tracing configuration and sample #69158
    arch-wasm, area-System.Diagnostics-mono
  • Add Stream ReadAtLeast and ReadExactly #69272
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Use CLOCK_BOOTTIME to calculate BootTime on linux #67589
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Added null safety on EvaluateOnFrame #69307
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [RyuJIT] Emit shlx, sarx, shrx on x64 #67182
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix HTTP3 stress #69182
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [debugger] First draft of managed debugger on wasi #67272
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Use locateFile to resolve path for assets outside of remoteSources #69441
    arch-wasm, community-contribution
  • Merge several version of MsQuicStream SendAsync code #68772
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [draft] [wasm] JS Marshaler based on code-gen and [JSImport] and [JSExport] attributes #66304
    NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Draft for Min/Max intrinsics xarch #69434
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add AppContext data support for DefaultMaxConnectionsPerServer #68952
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Allow source generation for classes with ignored init-only props #69327
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Fix some scaling issues with the global queue in the thread pool #69386
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • Fix NRE in EmitCall for DynamicMethod #69027
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, community-contribution
  • Ensure the shared framework build uses the generated runtime.json #69455
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Add EvaluationResult Scheme for arrays. #67095
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [mono][interp] Add tiering within interpreter #68823
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Add support for delegate GDV and method-based vtable GDV #68703
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Zip64ExtraField reads StartDiskNumber as uint32 #62959
    area-System.IO.Compression, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Arm64: Use csel and ccmp for conditional moves #67894
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Display parents' members on GetProperties. #68907
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • Fixes #64159 - JsonSerializerContext source generation fails with keyword identifiers #66876
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, source-generator
  • Add markdown Readme for System.Text.Json #69015
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Use span to pass type modifiers in RuntimeTypeHandle.GetTypeHelper #69425
    community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet run looks in the wrong bin/obj directories if targetting only one non-AnyCPU platform in <Platforms>, but works with <Platform> added #25514
  • [dotnet-watch] hot reload script injection should be more permisive. #25510
  • Some exceptions cannot be caught by a try/catch block or global exception handler #25509
  • Enable running Microsoft.NET.Build.Tasks.UnitTests in CI #25508
  • When multiple TargetFrameworks are used, RunProduceContentAssets is skipped on rebuild #25504

Closed

  • PackageValidation with --no-build when project has ProjectReference causes NETSDK1085 #24943
    7.0.1xx
  • [dotnet-sdk-7.0.100-preview.5.22257.3] All WPF apps launch failed with black screen or with exception about loading dlls #25289

PullRequests

Created

  • Implement functionality for templating workload and version constraints #25505
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove dependency on Assembly.GetCallingAssembly #25494
    Area-Infrastructure, DO NOT MERGE

Merged

  • Clear DOTNET_ROOT_arch environment variable #25480
  • Update Microsoft.NET.Compatibility.Common.targets #25132
    Area-Compatibility
  • document long paths-related error message when building on windows #25490
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • add tests to cover the resolution of AnalysisLevel known-strings #25454
    Area-NetSDK
  • Check if publishaot is used #25323
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #25403
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1777920 #25346
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update Test project TestAppEchoDotnetRoot to current framework #22784
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the target framework for the test projects #25479
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-18
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Update required members #6140

Merged

  • Minor updates to ref fields proposal #6138

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [LSP] Semantic tokens slow to colorize when typing #61393
  • Fully remove parameter null-checking implementation #61390
    Compiler.Next
  • Use `FieldTypeEncoder` API to emit field metadata #61385
    C# 11.0
  • `CopyRefAssembly` task should log the file copy #61383
    17.3
  • "Go to type" contextual navigation command #61378
  • [Bug] 'ref this' argument in a structure isn't work when translate to VB.net. #61374

Closed

  • Double clicking inline text hint for var inserts incorrectly #61052
    17.3
  • The compiler should not report CS8347 when there is no danger of escape #61296
    Compiler.Next
  • Calling ReplaceNode/ReplaceNodes on the Type specifier of a DeclarationPatternSyntax results in losing a space #61371
  • C# Extract method selects wrong part of code #58971
    17.3

PullRequests

Created

  • [LSP] More correctly respect background analysis scope #61392
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Specify targets when loading MSBuildWorkspace #61391
    Area-IDE
  • Support 'scoped' modifier for parameters and locals #61389
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Emit CompilerFeaturesRequiredAttribute #61388
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members
  • Add test demonstrating issue does not repro #61387
    Area-Compilers
  • Log additional information from CopyRefAssembly #61384
    Area-Compilers
  • Add lambda parameters in scope in nameof using proper binder #61382
    Area-Compilers
  • Update 'Rename's commit behavior to be async. #61381
    Area-IDE
  • Fix typo #61380
    Area-IDE
  • Add opened and closed event handling for non-source documents #61377
    Area-IDE
  • Verify classification on var pattern #61376
    Area-IDE
  • Add telemetry dump of Options #61373
    Need Design Review

Merged

  • Make the extract-method command async (using the background work indicator). #61375
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add extract method test #61386
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add support for CompilerFeatureRequiredAttribute #61113
    Area-Compilers
  • Remaining fallback options #60888
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Use the correct span to rename after invoking extract-method manually. #61369
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Minor simplification to rename code #61379
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Unify nint and IntPtr #60913
    Area-Compilers, 17.3
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #61372
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • [WIP] [Do not review] Try various changes to fix CI for #61351 #61363
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Add new collapsing option for metadata files that contain source #61205
    Area-IDE
  • EditorFeatures.Cocoa: Bump macos workload to RC3 #61250
    Area-IDE
  • Give a specific message when analyzer references a more-recent compiler version #61261
    Area-Compilers
  • Parse `unchecked` gracefully in operators #61309
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - CheckedUserDefinedOperators
  • [semi-auto-props]: Rename ContainsFieldKeyword, revise cases that should handle FieldKeywordBackingField #61310
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Ref fields escape analysis #61195
    Area-Compilers
  • Better completions in generic constraints #61335
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Reduce allocations in DirectMemoryAccessStreamReader.ReadToEnd #61351
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Improve SyntaxNormalizer performance #50778
    Area-Compilers
  • Allow creating SourceText from a StringBuilder #61251
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Allow skeletons to be reused in frozen-partial scenarios (for inheritance margin) #61286
    Area-IDE
  • Synthesize a method that throws when a method is deleted in EnC [Alternate] #61160
    Area-Compilers
  • Mask count in shift operations on native integers #61341
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Native Int
  • Adjust conversion from nuint to float/double #61345
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Native Int
  • File types binding #60977
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Hot reload isn't working - aspnetcore-browser-refresh.js isn't being injected into the page #41732
    Discussions
  • Issue when binding DateTime to input type="time" #41731
    6.0.x
  • Add option to control whether controller names are trimmed or not when used for routing #41730
  • Component Governance alerts of eventsource for signalr package in npm #41729
  • Asp.net core source code gives compile time errors in Visual studio #41727
  • Add generic method overloads to Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Results static class #41724

Closed

  • ModelState validation changes when adding a new property to an existing model #41687
  • Undocumented breaking changes .NET 5 => .NET 6 #41679
  • Filters that don't have any parameters shouldn't allocate an empty array #41705
    7.0-preview5
  • Support for dotnet-watch to reload when server listening log is on a single line missing from 5.0.4xx #39610
    5.0.x
  • npm project @microsoft/signalr depend on security vulnerable version of eventsource #41728
  • Blazor bindings broken by cascading value #41700
  • System.IO.DirectoryInfo doesn't work properly in client-side Blazor WebAssembly #41706

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix the RedirectHandler (in Mvc.Testing) for relative URIs #41742
    community-contribution
  • release/6.0 Quarantine all but pri 0 shadow copy test #41738
    area-runtime, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Add IServerDelegationFeature to DI #41737
    area-runtime
  • Allow explicit manual runs of mirror pipeline #41736
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Quarantine a couple IIS tests #41741
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview5
  • Use Array.Empty for parameterless filters #41740
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview5
  • Quarantine StreamPool_MultipleStreamsConcurrent_StreamsReturnedToPool #41735
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview5
  • Move RateLimiting projects in their own folder #41734
    7.0-preview5
  • Add installer artifacts to source build intermediate #41733
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview5
  • Add AppOfflineDroppedWhileSiteIsDown_SiteReturns503_InProcess to test retry list #41718
    7.0-preview5
  • Add script to mirror one internal branch to another #41715
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview5

Updated

  • Fall back to using old command when GetServer isn't supported #41649
    area-runtime
  • Initialize Activity with parent ID #41568
    area-runtime
  • Update duende versions to 6.0.4 #41370
    area-infrastructure
  • Add Request Decompression middleware #40279
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Http Response fails when writing more than 255MB #41239
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Add linefeed line terminator switch #41101
    area-runtime, 6.0.x
  • Add trimming annotations to DotNetObjectReference #41610
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-jsinterop
  • JSON "null" request body rejected as an empty request body #41002
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Task and ValueTask are not covariant #41719
    area-runtime
  • Update Trimming.md #41720
    area-infrastructure
  • Output caching middleware #41037
    area-runtime

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Remove OpenSans fonts from maui-mobile template #7313
  • ListView item size differences Windows/Android #7312
  • [Android] ListView with ItemsSource ObservableCollection crashes on item removal #7311
  • The manifest package for 'ios' could not be found in any of the expected NuGet sources #7310
  • Modal is currently broken on WinUI #7307
  • [WinUI] Fix FlyoutPage tests #7306
    6.0.300-servicing
  • [Android] MauiIcon BaseSize and ForegroundScale doesn't work #7305
  • [Android] MauiSplashScreen BaseSize doesn't work #7304
  • [Android] (Android 12 only) When app is started from device, icon is used as splashscreen #7303
  • Error DEP0700 #7299
  • Grid does not reduce height request. #7298
  • ScrollView.ScrollToAsync(x, y false) returns before scroll is completed (when #7295
  • Android MenuItem acts differently on real/virtual device #7292
  • Icon #7291
  • [Android] API 31 (Android 12) svg on splashscreen is not showing #7289
  • EmbeddedResource is not working with SVG image #7288
  • I have setting in drop down list in tree view doesn't show. #7286
  • Building untrimmed application on Android on Release ends with Exception 'Unable to find Java.Lang.AbstractMethodError constructor' #7284
  • Crash due to non-thread-safe access to Exception stack frames when using async/await #7283

Closed

  • Starting the debugger with WiFi and Mobile Data turned off crashes #7189
  • The character set provided in ContentType is invalid 'windows-1253' #7218
  • [iOS] - Frame not resizing. #7217
  • Grid doesn't dynamically size when content size changes #6420
    6.0.3xx-sr1
  • Border does not draw on android #7238
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Nested FlexLayout presentation error #6161
    6.0.3xx-sr1
  • HotReload does not work with StaticResource #7290
  • Application.Current.OpenWindow(window) does not open a new window #5271
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Wrong rendering of Grid cell content #7122
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Page BackgroundColor Wrong on Windows #7054
  • Running app on Android fine but immediately exits on Windows : "Layout cycle detected. Layout could not complete." #7280

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix RTL in AbsoluteLayout #7309
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Setup WinUI to run window scoped tests in new window #7308
  • [iOS] Fix some naming cells #7302
    area/layout 🔲
  • Ensure that Grid is propagating the BindingContext to the row/col definitions #7301
    area/layout 🔲
  • Enable platform identifier in compile globs #7300
    area/single project ☝️
  • [Housekeeping] Added ImageButton sample using VisualStateManager #7296
    t/bug, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [Tizen] Update ShellView #7287
    area/shell 🐢, platform/tizen, 6.0.3xx-sr1

Merged

  • Propagate layout requests up the tree for Content/Layout Views #7297
    area/layout 🔲
  • [Android] Render Border without set a Stroke #7247
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, 6.0.3xx-sr1
  • Ensure that the z-index sort also preserves original add order #7270
    area/layout 🔲
  • Cleanup cake file, add targets, fix for iOS Pair #7241
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Enable creating blank issues #7282

Updated

  • [Handlers] Make sure to update Content on handlers when the ControlTemplate changes #7235
    area/controls 🎮
  • [workload] Remove Microsoft.Maui.Dependencies pack #6871
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, .NET 7
  • Add Public API Analyzer to the Shipping products #6003
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Controls.Core] Handle Null Values for AdaptiveTrigger #7267
    area/controls 🎮, 6.0.300-servicing

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Metadata: calling OwnsOne with collection navigation owns a collection reference #28057
  • Problem with many-to-many with composite key on one side needing to rename SQL columns #28055
  • Use GetDiscriminatorValue for TPT and TPC in queries #28054
  • Query Does Not Return Included Entity After Execution #28053
  • Sqlite: DateOnly/TimeOnly arithmetic should throw exception #28051
  • Invalid column enum name on update database #28050
  • Subclassing DbContext Duplicates Migration Changes #28049
  • Receiving: "System.NotSupportedException : Collection was of a fixed size." when not using a fixed-size collection. #28047

Closed

  • Translate GetType() for entity types with inheritance #13424
    7.0.0
  • Using + or - operators between DateTimeOffset.Now and a TimeSpan in a query fail #27028
    7.0.0
  • Can we have a `DeleteBehaviorAttribute` #9621
    7.0.0
  • TPC scenario not supported #28015
  • Scaffolding creates lowercase DbContext #27886
    7.0.0-preview5
  • Navigation property between two models with "columns in common" without a join/pivot table #27979
  • Support self-referencing many-to-many with a single navigation #23348

PullRequests

Created

  • SqlServer: Throw for split query with skip without order by #28056

Merged

  • Query: Translate GetType == type on hierarchy #28011
    auto-merge
  • Query: Change RelationalCommandCache to allow non-SelectExpression as… #28048
    providers-beware
  • Attribute for configuring DeleteBehavior #27630
    community-contribution
  • SqlServer: Block arithmetic on date/time expressions when type mappin… #28052
    auto-merge
  • Capitalize database name #27966
    auto-merge, community-contribution
  • Query: Minor refactoring in shaper #28046
    auto-merge
  • Query: Fix some nullability errors #28045
    auto-merge

Updated

  • Add support for Global Query Filters on derived types. #27978
    propose-close, waiting-for-response
  • Add Migration name check #26396

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-18
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • What component versions are contained in the nighly build of the SDK? #13849

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #13853

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #13828
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #13789
  • [main] Enable razor-compiler and format in Source-Build #13844

Updated

  • [release/6.0.3xx] Add razor-compiler to Source Build #13652
  • Enable the sdk and installer repos in source-build #13846
